import Link from 'next/link'; import { Input, Menu, Row, Col } from 'antd'; import UserProfile from './UserProfile'; import LoginForm from './LoginForm'; const AppLayout = ({ children }) => { const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); return (
Nodebird Profile Profile {isLoggedIn ? : } {children} Naver
); }; export default AppLayout;
